attributes.action: Invistigate how MFI can continue to operate and sell shoddy goods to the public and not be made accountable whilst smaller companies are investigated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I like many, many, people have purchsed many thousands of pounds  worth of kitchen furniture, some fitted others not fitted, the furniture is rubbish and not fit for the purpose, all of us have been trying to sort it out some for several years, Trading Standards will do nothing, during  attempts to get it sorted we have met many people who are in the same position, its shocking how many that there are, yet whilst MFI continue to trade, and rip people off Trading Standards say they agree with us and many others but take no action.  We the voting tax payer now demeand that action is taken
